mapper.insert: insert into student (bankid, password, `name`, imgUrl, memberid) values (#{bankid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{imgUrl}, #{memberid})
mapper.update: update student set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
update student, memberCard set student.exp = #{exp}, memberCard.level = #{level} where student.id = #{id} and memberCard.id = student.memberid;
